title: Castle Rock S1E01 Explained
author: Think Story
comment: Thank you for doing these explanation videos!! Other YouTube’s have a 10 minute intro of just rambling haha. You get straight to the point

Was really expecting the dog to be a Saint Bernard as a nod to Cujo. Also wonder if the cryptic conversation with his client alluded to the idea that Henry died at some point, hence the missing memory. The hourglass stumped me. Perhaps she times her interactions to Henry’s belonging so as not to get overloaded by her supernatural sensory perceptions.
Concise, quick, and with great attention to detail. Subbed!
.. and the opera music Lacy was listening to in the car was what Andy Dufresne played over the loudspeakers in the Shawshank Redemption movie
The sound in the King universe is a thinny a thinning between worlds. Explained better in the Dark Tower.
description:
A new series explaining the hidden details, mysteries, easter eggs and Stephen King references in the hit television show "Castle Rock." The following is a breakdown of season one, episode one "Severance."
